name: dsndx

body.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(cds, cnx), cdc(nat1, nat2))
-| wceq(cds, cslot(cdc(nat1, nat2)))
-| wcel(cdc(nat1, nat2), cn)
body.pretty:
⊢ (dist ` ndx)= cdc(1, 2)
⊣ dist = Slot(cdc(1, 2))
⊣ cdc(1, 2)∈ ℕ

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(cds, cnx), cdc(nat1, nat2))
-| wceq(cds, cslot(cdc(nat1, nat2)))
-| wcel(cdc(nat1, nat2), cn)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (dist ` ndx)= cdc(1, 2)
⊣ dist = Slot(cdc(1, 2))
⊣ cdc(1, 2)∈ ℕ

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(cds, cnx), cdc(nat1, nat2))
-| wcel(cdc(nat1, nat2), cn)

body.origin:
|- wcel(cdc(nat1, nat2), cn)
-| wcel(nat1, cn0)
-| wcel(nat2, cn)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(cds, cnx), cdc(nat1, nat2))
-| wcel(nat1, cn0)
-| wcel(nat2, cn)

|- wceq(cfv(cds, cnx), cdc(nat1, nat2))
-| wcel(nat2, cn)

comment: Index value of the ~ df-ds slot. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Aug-2015.)
